availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Nicholas Hord (Carter County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Jefferson County, Kentucky, native. Son of Willis Hord and Polly Hord. Married to Ann Hord. Father of Louis Hord, Mary Hord, Bainton Hord, Arthur Hord, John W. Hord, William T. Hord, and Frank J. Hord. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Owned eleven enslaved persons in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860. Owned eleven enslaved persons in Carter County in 1860.
